title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
introduction: Cloud computing is the delivery of on-demand computing resources over the internet. It includes services like servers, storage, databases, networking, and software.
details: Cloud computing offers scalability, flexibility, and cost-efficiency as resources can be easily provisioned and released based on demand. Public cloud providers like AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud offer a wide range of services to businesses and individuals. Learning about cloud computing involves understanding different cloud models (public, private, hybrid), cloud service providers, and cloud security.
